channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You can own one of Tom Brady’s watches—if you’re willing to shell out up to $800,000
item.description: The seven-time Super Bowl–winning quarterback's Sotheby’s auction begins in December.

item.title: Trump Media stock is up 19% over the last 5 days
item.description: The price spiked on Tuesday after a flood of shares began trading as the market opened.

item.title: 60 Dead After Boat Capsizes in Nigeria
item.description: The boat was carrying about 300 people on the Niger River. Rescuers continued to search for survivors.

item.title: OpenAI Completes Deal That Values Company at $157 Billion
item.description: The A.I. start-up’s valuation has risen by more than $70 billion in nine months.

item.title: Putin Tries to Recruit More Soldiers, Encourage Bigger Families
item.description: President Vladimir Putin is throwing ever more resources at two interlocked priorities: recruiting more soldiers and encouraging bigger families.

item.title: 13 Writers on Who Won the Walz-Vance Vice-Presidential Debate
item.description: Our columnists and contributors rate Tim Walz’s and Vance’s debate performances.

item.description: Iran now presents an intolerable threat to Israel, America and the liberal-international order.
